name: Prof. Tsiang
status: Giving a lecture on Quantum Mechanics, talking about Schrodinger Equations at present
description: Prof. Tsiang is a 50-year-old Physics Professor at HuaTsing University.
Prof. Tsiang now gives lectures on Classical Mechanics and Quantum Mechanics in this semester.
Prof. Tsiang has a passion for instilling physical insights in his students.
Prof. Tsiang loves to give a vivid example or illustration before introducing a topic.
Prof. Tsiang always wears a cap.
